content:
Estimated Examples:
Example 1:
Text: You shouldn't be with someone you don't love.
Annotation from annotator: 3

Example 2:
Text: You don't have to help out your parents if you don't feel like it.
Annotation from annotator: 1

Example 3:
Text: You have to do whatever is necessary in an emergency situation.
Annotation from annotator: 3

Example 4:
Text: It's rude to make baseless accusations against another person.
Annotation from annotator: 3

Example 5:
Text: It's wrong for a parent to do things to make their children loose respect of them.
Annotation from annotator: 3

Example 6:
Text: It's good to get a friend's help.
Annotation from annotator: 3

Example 7:
Text: You shouldn't be up and about if you're sick.
Annotation from annotator: 3

Example 8:
Text: It's good to play games of chance where you can win money.
Annotation from annotator: 1

Example 9:
Text: You shouldn't post inappropriate pictures online.
Annotation from annotator: 3

Example 10:
Text: It's wrong to value things over people.
Annotation from annotator: 3

Example 11:
Text: You should always give your kids financial advice.
Annotation from annotator: 2

Example 12:
Text: It's okay to enjoy powdered milk.
Annotation from annotator: 3

Example 13:
Text: It's good to give advice to your friends.
Annotation from annotator: 3

Example 14:
Text: It is important for both partners to use birth control items.
Annotation from annotator: 2

Example 15:
Text: It's good to want others to celebrate your joys with you.
Annotation from annotator: 3

Example 16:
Text: It's expected that kids will do things to help out their parents.
Annotation from annotator: 3

Example 17:
Text: It is normal for students to pass notes
Annotation from annotator: 3

Example 18:
Text: It is good to have rules.
Annotation from annotator: 3

Example 19:
Text: It's good to be in control of your sexuality.
Annotation from annotator: 3

Example 20:
Text: You shouldn't date a bad partner.
Annotation from annotator: 3

Example 21:
Text: You should only call the cops for emergencies.
Annotation from annotator: 3

Example 22:
Text: If you have conflict in your marriage, it is expected that you always consider your children's feelings.
Annotation from annotator: 3

Example 23:
Text: You shouldn't be friends with someone that talks badly about you behind your back.
Annotation from annotator: 3

Example 24:
Text: You shouldn't be a dangerous person.
Annotation from annotator: 4

Example 25:
Text: It's rude to mislead people about your health.
Annotation from annotator: 3

Example 26:
Text: People shouldn't want others to debase them, as it mars their souls.
Annotation from annotator: 2

Example 27:
Text: It is good to be yourself.
Annotation from annotator: 3

Example 28:
Text: You shouldn't scare your coworkers.
Annotation from annotator: 3

Example 29:
Text: It's considered juvenile to hate people without a good reason.
Annotation from annotator: 3

Example 30:
Text: It's ok to make your own reproductive choices.
Annotation from annotator: 3

Human-Rated Examples:
Example 1:
Text: You should not engage in romance with a patient you treat.
Annotation from annotator: 3

Example 2:
Text: Before kicking someone out it is important to make sure your feelings will be permanent.
Annotation from annotator: 3

Example 3:
Text: It's hurtful to hate somebody close to you.
Annotation from annotator: 4

Example 4:
Text: It's bad to feel other people are inferior to you.
Annotation from annotator: 2

Example 5:
Text: It's not okay to fake things in a social situation.
Annotation from annotator: 2

Example 6:
Text: It's expected that the husband pay child support.
Annotation from annotator: 2

Example 7:
Text: You shouldn't call out your family over petty things.
Annotation from annotator: 3

Example 8:
Text: Adults are expected to bathe daily.
Annotation from annotator: 2

Example 9:
Text: It's ok to tell someone you aren't interested in talking when you're busy at work.
Annotation from annotator: 4

Example 10:
Text: It's wrong to be too needy to people because people find it annoying.
Annotation from annotator: 3

Example 11:
Text: You should not pursue a relationship with someone much younger than you.
Annotation from annotator: 2

Example 12:
Text: It's not okay to be to happy with a material object.
Annotation from annotator: 0

Example 13:
Text: Your grandparent would be sad if you broke off contact with them.
Annotation from annotator: 3

Example 14:
Text: Families should be able to talk out their problems with each other.
Annotation from annotator: 3

Example 15:
Text: It's good to get help when you need it.
Annotation from annotator: 3

Example 16:
Text: Your boyfriend has the right to wear whatever underwear he chooses.
Annotation from annotator: 4

Example 17:
Text: It's good to teach children that their boundaries should be respected.
Annotation from annotator: 3

Example 18:
Text: It's wrong to lash out at someone.
Annotation from annotator: 3

Example 19:
Text: It is okay to not want to go to a party.
Annotation from annotator: 3

Example 20:
Text: You should be understanding of your family's decisions when they're weak.
Annotation from annotator: 2

Example 21:
Text: You shouldn't be bitter and salty about petty things.
Annotation from annotator: 2

Example 22:
Text: It's understandable if you're suspicious when a widower in your family gets together with a widower soon after their spouse's died.
Annotation from annotator: 2

Example 23:
Text: You shoulld not worry about others being jealous when posting things on facebook.
Annotation from annotator: 3

Example 24:
Text: It's bad for a child to be in danger.
Annotation from annotator: 3

Example 25:
Text: You shouldn't wear a nightdress if you're male.
Annotation from annotator: 2

Example 26:
Text: It's wrong to assume someone has a disability because they talk differently.
Annotation from annotator: 3

Example 27:
Text: It's not okay to stray from a relationship.
Annotation from annotator: 3

Example 28:
Text: You should always help out your customers when they have a problem.
Annotation from annotator: 3

Example 29:
Text: It's okay to not know how to drive.
Annotation from annotator: 2

Example 30:
Text: People are expected to want to be close to their family.
Annotation from annotator: 2

Target Example:
Text: You shouldn't discriminate against people because of their income level.
Annotation from annotator:
